name: The Boat
description:
A game about a person, a dog, a ship, and more.

Made in a few hours using Bitsy and Borksy.

How to play:

In-gameControllerKeyboardMoveArrows / JoystickArrowsJump*Up arrow / Joystick up*Up arrow*

*You can only jump iinside the [mysterious creature]. The jump is a little bit strange.
